title: Greenbelt Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions       Close distance to Greenbelt Park  City of Greenbelt including museum 301-474-8000 1 mile The city of Greenbelt was one of three towns built in the 1930's by the federal government as part of the New Deal.  Goddard Space Flight Center (NASA) Visitor Center 301-286-3979 3 miles Discover man's exporation into Space.  College Park Aviation Museum 301-864-6029 3 miles Did you know that Orville Wright delivered the first U.S. Mail flight at College Park airport?  University of Maryland 301-405-1000 4 miles Home of the Maryland Terrapins  Beltsville Agricultural Research Center 301-504-9403 5 miles Patuxent Wildlife Visitor Center 301-497-5760 7 miles Discover a part of the U.S. Fish and Wildlife refuge system.        Washington DC Attractions  Kenilworth Park & Aquatic Gardens 202-426-5961 8 miles  National Mall 202-426-6841 13 miles  Lincoln Memorial 13 miles  Martin Luther King Memorial 13 miles  President's Park (White House) 202-208-1631 13 miles  Washington Monument 13 miles  Vietnam Veterans Memorial 13 miles  Frederick Douglass National Historic Site 202-426-5961 14 miles       Baltimore, Maryland attractions Fort McHenry National Monument 410-962-4290 32 miles   Inner Harbor, Baltimore, Maryland Click here for Visit Baltimore website. Camden Yards (home of the Baltimore Orioles MLB) and M&T Bank Stadium (home of the Baltimore Ravens NFL)
